May be an image of text that says 'THE 100 BEST YA BOOKS OF ALL TIME Elizabeth With a panel of celebrated authors Acevedo, Kacen Callender, Jenny Han, Jason Reynolds, Adam Silvera, Angie Thomas and Nicola Yoon-TIME presents the most compelling, enlightening and influential young-adult books, in chronological order beginning in the 1800s HOW WE MADE THIS LIST'.

node.text:
THE LIGHTNING THIEF is one of @TIME's 100 Best YA Books of All Time! 

Thank you to TIME and the powerhouse group of YA Author panelists who created this list.

Demigods, check out the incredible company Percy is in on this list at the link in bio and update your TBRs!
//
From Becky: “The absolute best thing about Rick's TLT being on the TIME list is the other authors of young adult and children's books on this list!  Feeling blessed that Rick was included but to reassure parents of Rick's young readers TLT is a middle grade children's book not YA.”
